items.description: Software Engineer specializing in AI/ML with expertise in designing and deploying multi-agent LLM systems and RAG applications in production. Experienced in building agentic workflows using prompt engineering, tool-calling, and vector search to solve complex enterprise problems. Skilled in backend and cloud-native development with a proven track record of optimizing AI systems for cost efficiency, accuracy, and scale in fast-paced, collaborative environments.

items.title: Software Engineer (AI Solutions)
items.subtitle: Pacific Investment Management Company (PIMCO)
items.description:
Engineered production multi-agent system with API/library tool calls, RAG retrieval, and vector DB semantic search to answer portfolio performance queries, improving productivity by 75%. 
Built C#/.NET RAG-based tool to prefill DDQs, reducing manual workload by 40%. 
Authored and presented firmwide LLM Cost Optimization Guide, decreasing LLM usage costs by ~50%. 
Created regression testing framework for agentic applications to ensure accuracy across iterations. 
Deployed ML-powered apps on AWS EKS; monitored using Datadog and Komodor. Tech Stack: Python, Agents SDK, AutoGen, OpenAI API, C#, .NET, SQL, AWS, JavaScript

items.title: Software Engineer (Compliance)
items.subtitle: Pacific Investment Management Company (PIMCO)

Upgraded hedging service (Java version, GitLab migration, API refactor). 
Managed weekly production releases and implemented usability improvements in compliance engine. 
Tech Stack: Java, Python, Bash, AVRO, SQL, Splunk, Autosys

items.title: Technology Analyst Intern (Compliance)
items.subtitle: Pacific Investment Management Company (PIMCO)
items.description: Developed tagging enhancement for Rev3 Compliance Engine to organize and navigate components. Developed back end in Java and used transactional based Oracle queries to update database. Defined AVRO schemas to send and receive data between the server and UI. Presented and demoed tagging enhancement to over 100 employees at end of summer.

items.title: Technology Analyst Intern (Booking Platform)
items.subtitle: Pacific Investment Management Company (PIMCO)
items.description:
Full stack development of audit service for Booking Platform, deployed on PCF. 
Managed the project from inception to production deployment including full design documentation. 
Developed back end in Java using Spring framework connected to Oracle database using AMPS Topics. 
Presented and demoed working audit service to over 100 employees at end of summer.
